section.p: As an application operator, you must fulfill the following prerequisites:

ul.li: You must have access to the OpenStack platform as a user with the monasca-user role or any other role that is authorized to use the monitoring functions. Additional roles are optional. Contact your OpenStack operator for more information.
You must be assigned to the OpenStack project you want to monitor.

section.p: Log in to OpenStack Horizon with your user name and password provided as login information by OpenStack. The functions you can use in OpenStack Horizon depend on your access permissions.

For monitoring your services and virtual machines, you use the monitoring user interface which is integrated into OpenStack Horizon. The functionality is available on the Monitoring tab. It provides access to the monitoring data of all projects to which you are assigned. Before you start, select the project you want to work on.

section.title: Web Browsers
section.p: To perform monitoring tasks, you must use one of the Web browsers supported by :

ul.li: Microsoft Internet Explorer 11.0 (with Compatibility View disabled)
